001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.io.CharStreams;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.*;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.io.TempDir;
007
008import java.io.*;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012
013import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.GRADUATE;
014import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE;
015import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.SummaryReport.GRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
016import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.SummaryReport.UNDERGRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
017import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
018import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
019
020public class SummaryReportTest {
021
022  @Test
023  public void ungradedAssignmentsDoNotCountTowardsGraded() {
024    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
025    Student student = new Student("student");
026    gradeBook.addStudent(student);
027    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
028    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
029
030    Grade grade = new Grade(assignment, Grade.NO_GRADE);
031    student.setGrade(assignment.getName(), grade);
032
033    assertThat(SummaryReport.noStudentHasGradeFor(assignment, gradeBook), equalTo(true));
034
035  }
036
037  @Test
038  public void reportsAreGeneratedInCorrectDirectories(@TempDir File tempDirectory) throws IOException {
039    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
040    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
041    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
042
043    double undergradScore = 3.0;
044    Student undergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, "undergrad", UNDERGRADUATE, undergradScore);
045
046    double gradScore = 3.5;
047    Student grad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, "grad", GRADUATE, gradScore);
048
049    SummaryReport.dumpReports(gradeBook.getStudentIds(), gradeBook, tempDirectory, false);
050
051    assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(undergrad, tempDirectory, UNDERGRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME, undergradScore);
052    assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(grad, tempDirectory, GRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME, gradScore);
053  }
054
055  private Student addStudentInSectionWithScore(GradeBook gradeBook, Assignment assignment, String studentId, Student.Section enrolledSection, double undergradScore) {
056    Student undergrad = new Student(studentId);
057    undergrad.setEnrolledSection(enrolledSection);
058    gradeBook.addStudent(undergrad);
059    undergrad.setGrade(assignment, undergradScore);
060    return undergrad;
061  }
062
063  private void assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(Student student, File tempDirectory, String dirFileName, double studentScore) throws IOException {
064    File directory = new File(tempDirectory, dirFileName);
065    assertThat(directory.exists(), equalTo(true));
066
067    File reportFile = new File(directory, SummaryReport.getReportFileName(student.getId()));
068    assertThat(reportFile.exists(), equalTo(true));
069
070    String reportContents = readTextFromFile(reportFile);
071    assertThat(reportContents, containsString(String.valueOf(studentScore)));
072  }
073
074  private String readTextFromFile(File file) throws IOException {
075    StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
076    CharStreams.copy(new FileReader(file), writer);
077    return writer.getBuffer().toString();
078  }
079
080  @Test
081  public void totalsArePrintedForAllStudents() {
082    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
083    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
084    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
085
086    String worseUndergradStudentName = "worseUndergrad";
087    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 3.0);
088
089    String betterUndergradStudentName = "betterUndergrad";
090    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 3.5);
091
092    String worseGradStudentName = "worseGrad";
093    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseGradStudentName, GRADUATE, 3.0);
094
095    String betterGradStudentName = "betterGrad";
096    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterGradStudentName, GRADUATE, 3.5);
097
098    calculateTotalGradesForStudents(gradeBook, false);
099
100    CapturingPrintWriter out = new CapturingPrintWriter();
101    SummaryReport.printOutStudentTotals(gradeBook.studentsStream().collect(Collectors.toSet()), out);
102
103    String written = out.getTextWrittenToWriter();
104    String[] strings = { betterUndergradStudentName, worseUndergradStudentName, betterGradStudentName, worseGradStudentName };
105    assertThat(written, stringContainsInOrder(Arrays.asList(strings)));
106  }
107
108  private void calculateTotalGradesForStudents(GradeBook gradeBook, boolean assignLetterGrades) {
109    PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(new Writer() {
110      @Override
111      public void write(char[] cbuf, int off, int len) {
112
113      }
114
115      @Override
116      public void flush() {
117
118      }
119
120      @Override
121      public void close() {
122
123      }
124    });
125
126    gradeBook.studentsStream().forEach(student -> SummaryReport.dumpReportTo(gradeBook, student, pw, assignLetterGrades));
127  }
128
129  private static class CapturingPrintWriter extends PrintWriter {
130    public CapturingPrintWriter() {
131      super(new StringWriter());
132    }
133
134    public String getTextWrittenToWriter() {
135      return ((StringWriter) this.out).getBuffer().toString();
136    }
137  }
138
139  @Test
140  public void assignLetterGradesAccordingToGradeBookRangesForSection() {
141    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
142    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 10.0);
143    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
144
145    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges undergradLetterGradeRanges = gradeBook.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE);
146    undergradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A).setRange(95, 100);
147    undergradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A_MINUS).setRange(90, 94);
148    undergradLetterGradeRanges.validate();
149
150    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges gradLetterGradeRanges = gradeBook.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.GRADUATE);
151    gradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A).setRange(92, 100);
152    gradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A_MINUS).setRange(90, 91);
153    gradLetterGradeRanges.validate();
154
155    String betterUndergradStudentName = "betterUndergrad";
156    Student betterUndergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 9.7);
157    assertThat(betterUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
158
159    String worseUndergradStudentName = "worseUndergrad";
160    Student worseUndergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 9.2);
161    assertThat(worseUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
162
163    String gradStudentName = "grad";
164    Student grad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, gradStudentName, GRADUATE, 9.2);
165    assertThat(grad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
166
167    calculateTotalGradesForStudents(gradeBook, true);
168
169    assertThat(betterUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
170    assertThat(worseUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A_MINUS));
171    assertThat(grad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
172  }
173
174  @Test
175  public void assignmentDueInThePastIsLate() {
176    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("Test", 4.0);
177    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(3);
178    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
179
180    assertThat(SummaryReport.dueDateHasPassed(assignment), equalTo(true));
181  }
182
183  @Test
184  public void assignmentDueInTheFutureIsNotLate() {
185    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("Test", 4.0);
186    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(3);
187    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
188
189    assertThat(SummaryReport.dueDateHasPassed(assignment), equalTo(false));
190  }
191
192  @Test
193  void assignmentWithAllZeroGradesDoesNotAppearInReport(@TempDir File tempDirectory) throws IOException {
194    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
195    String someNonZeroGradesName = "someNonZeroGrades";
196    String allZeroGradesName = "allZeroGrades";
197
198    Assignment someNonZeroGrades = gradeBook.addAssignment(new Assignment(someNonZeroGradesName, 10.0));
199    Assignment allZeroGrades = gradeBook.addAssignment(new Assignment(allZeroGradesName, 10.0));
200
201    Student studentWithSomeNonZeroGrades =
202      gradeBook.addStudent(new Student("studentWithSomeNonZeroGrades"))
203        .setLastName("studentWithSomeNonZeroGrades")
204        .setEnrolledSection(UNDERGRADUATE)
205        .setGrade(someNonZeroGrades, 5.0)
206        .setGrade(allZeroGrades, 0.0);
207
208    Student studentWithAllZeroGrades =
209      gradeBook.addStudent(new Student("studentWithAllZeroGrades"))
210        .setLastName("studentWithAllZeroGrades")
211        .setEnrolledSection(UNDERGRADUATE)
212        .setGrade(someNonZeroGrades, 0.0)
213        .setGrade(allZeroGrades, 0.0);
214
215    assertThat(SummaryReport.noStudentHasGradeFor(allZeroGrades, gradeBook), equalTo(true));
216
217    SummaryReport.dumpReports(gradeBook.getStudentIds(), gradeBook, tempDirectory, false);
218
219    File studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReportFile = getStudentReportFile(tempDirectory, studentWithSomeNonZeroGrades);
220    assertThat(studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReportFile.exists(), equalTo(true));
221
222    String studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReport = readTextFromFile(studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReportFile);
223    assertThat(studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReport, containsString(someNonZeroGradesName));
224    assertThat(studentWithSomeNonZeroGradesReport, not(containsString(allZeroGradesName)));
225
226    File studentWithAllZeroGradesReportFile = getStudentReportFile(tempDirectory, studentWithAllZeroGrades);
227    assertThat(studentWithAllZeroGradesReportFile.exists(), equalTo(true));
228
229    String studentWithAllZeroGradesReport = readTextFromFile(studentWithAllZeroGradesReportFile);
230    assertThat(studentWithAllZeroGradesReport, containsString(someNonZeroGradesName));
231    assertThat(studentWithAllZeroGradesReport, not(containsString(allZeroGradesName)));
232
233  }
234
235  private static File getStudentReportFile(File directory, Student student) {
236    String sectionDirName;
237    switch (student.getEnrolledSection()) {
238      case GRADUATE:
239        sectionDirName = GRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
240        break;
241      case UNDERGRADUATE:
242        sectionDirName = UNDERGRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
243        break;
244      default:
245        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Don't know how to handle section: " + student.getEnrolledSection());
246    }
247
248    File sectionDirectory = new File(directory, sectionDirName);
249    return new File(sectionDirectory, SummaryReport.getReportFileName(student.getId()));
250  }
251
252}
